content.detailedDescription:
Not sure mufon would be interested because this event involved a vanishing person and no ufo. i have procrastinated submission of this incident to give time to think about what happened and to decide whether or not it would be of interest to anyone.
 
i was out for my morning walk several months ago about 07:00 a.M. the weather was clear and the sun was rising behind some trees in the s.E. as i walked i noticed an obscure individual approaching on my right about 40-50 feet away. definitely a shadowy individual with indistinct features walking on the grass about 5 to 10 feet from the side of a church building. it cast a shadow, arms swinging, leg motion normal, gray shadowy outline with some depth detail.  the individuals gate was unusually graceful and this is what sparked my interest to continue to watch him/her in hopes of getting a better view as this person advanced along side of the building. the individual approached a position between me and a small tree (that i later measured to be ~6 inches in diameter) where it promptly vanished. it never came out from the other side of this small tree. i was dumbfounded, got a few goose-bumps and stopped to keep watch. after a few minutes i walked over to the spot to see if there was some alley or door or something i was missing. to my assessment there was no place this person could have gone in the seconds between seeing and not seeing it. 
bi-location or multi-dimensional or illusion? i definitely saw it and can't offer any explanation.
content.summary: Individual vanishing in clear view

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9 o'clock on my way home from work i was driving on route 2 east through franklin ct. as i came underneath the franklin exit overpass i witnessed 6 large bright orange orbs hovering in the sky. at first i thought they were low flying planes or hełicopters from the local army base a couple of towns over (east lyme), because they were in a straight line formation. i could hear no engine noise however. for a brief moment i also mistook them as six successively lit, but not exploding, bottle rockets. as i watched them i realized they were not flying but in fact were stationary. i pulled off exit 22 about a quarter mile away and exited my car to watch these six bright orange orbs. i took video with my iphone and captured the sighting and although you can see the orbs, they look like six bright stars instead of the bright orange orbs i saw in real time. after doing a little research i found the "mysterious orange orb" page on facebook and immediately recognized them as the orange orbs i saw.
content.summary: 6 large bright low flying orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: We were camping out 5 of us when my girl friend saat the hell is that it looked like a ball of fire with a orb moving back and forth it wamoving.G very fast and is wasn't very high in the sky no sound at all.  i had my spot light with me and was turning iton and off and it stopped for a few seconds it was really seared.
content.summary: Slow moving fireball with see thru orb no sound

content.detailedDescription:
On june 21, 2013 i decided to start marking the sun set as it met the horizon to make me a rock calendar kinda like stone hinge. i am calling it mike hinge. i picked out a spot on the west side of my property placed a rectangle rock next to a fence post and spray painted the post gray. i sat my iphone on top of my tripod to mark the heading of where the sun was setting and what heading i was facing to make sure that i can make the same observation each month as the sun sets. i snapped a couple of photos of the sun setting and then turned my attention to the hills north of where i was standing. i snapped a couple of shots and then came into the house to download them on my computer. as i was going through the pictures i noticed these two triangle shaped objects that i had not seen while taking the pictures. i then cropped the pic to enlarge the objects. at first glance i thought they might have been birds but i've never taken any pictured of birds in flight that look like these. upon further observation of the objects i noticed that the one on the left bottom appears to be behind some telephone wires that are approximately 150 yards down my driveway which makes the object appear to be very large. the second object appears to be behind the leaves of the tree that is approximately 30 yards in front of me and also appears to be very large. i took two pictures just a few seconds apart and the objects are only in one of the photos. 
 i'm not saying these are uso's well i guess they are because i can not identify them. lol.. 
 i just wanted to send the pics in to you and maybe you can help me identify what they are..
 thank you in advance,
 michael l. dixon hmcs(sw)retired  
p.S. i did notice prior to taking the photos my iphone compass was malfunctioning by loosing it's magnetic north settings.
content.summary: These two objects appeared in a photograph. i didn't notice them while i was taking the picture.

content.detailedDescription: I was making a video of the moon and notice that the moon was pulsating, popping in and out i never saw that before, my real interest is to ask if you have had reports of the moon pulsating like this video shows.  there were lights in the sky but i couldn't capture on video.  i made a second video but the light wasn't in it.  this light looked like a star that moved from east to west then stopped suddenly and shine like a star, it never moved since then.  the object next to the moon i thought maybe lens flare but it moved and returned.  after watching the video i realized the pulsating sound seem to coincide with the pulsations from the moon.  please let me know if you have seen the moon behave like this.
content.summary: It was green blue appeared diassapeared and reappeared

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 14,2013, my fianc���, sister, and later another guest at the wedding confirmed my sighting in the seeley's bay area over a ball diamond, and then a body of water. for some reason i felt the need to look into the sky, only to see what looked to be a very bright yellow/orange light which then dimmed and gave way to a silver/grey looking craft the shape of an oval (length ways). it appeared as though there was a reflection from the sun on its top side, as it was bright and had an odd reflective look along the upper half. it moved quickly east, while periodically emitting short exhaust trails, approximately 80ft long, and in about 50ft intervals. after blowing out exhaust 3 times, the bright light once again engulfed the object, and it reappeared seconds later looking like a dull black object that looked like a stick. as the draft continued to cruise, still in the east direction, it seemed to spiral in place as it moved forward. the object in question looked to be at least 100ft long, but from the sky, about basketball size. while over the baseball diamond, appeared to be about 300-500 ft in altitude. after it changed shape, the craft dissipated. it might be important to add that as quickly as the exhaust was emitted, it vanished. when the craft was no longer visible, neither were any trails
content.summary: Craft left exhaust trail, changed shape, then disipated.

content.detailedDescription:
the 19th of june 2013 at about 930 pm she was on the porch in our frewsburg ny home and she called me to see these low flying airplanes. we watched as a red orb, steady red light, slowly moved across the sky, about 200 feet above the tree line. almost immediatley we saw more. all 6 of these were slow and solid red light, one would stop and another would almost catch up to it and it would begin again...., we watched as they almost turned left in the sky and headed towards jamestown ny. as we watched, the first four just blinked out, the 5th slowed and then sped up and blinked out. the last stopped dead in the sky and stayed there for several seconds and then follwed the rest and then went up at an angle and then blinked out. 

 i had taken pictures of these and still everyone does not believe me. my wife and son also stood there watching them. the local news said they were probably chineese lanterns......Education level there is a definate drop off.  these red orbs did not hover, blink or make any sound at all. they were very methodical. their was no breeze, wind or anything. when one went higher it just barely passed in front of the moon and you could just wsee the orb...Nothing else.

i did research on the internet and found another similar sighting in many states in 2011 as well as one in frewsburg ny, 2011....June 19th....Odd dont you think. 

 these were too low for satellites and were not chineese lanterns....Really.
we stood in awe as they passed one at a time....Each at vaired distances from each other.  

i hope someone with a level mind can explain these. i feel very strong in what i saw. i took over a dozen pictures....
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orbs over trees

content.detailedDescription: Me and my two brothers were sitting in our car in se portland off 57th duke smoking a cigarette i was looking around when a bright red-orange light caught my eye, i though it was nothing until i seen 3 more directly behind it they were moving pretty quick with no sound at all! the objects were moving in a straight line and vanished one by one!Two minutes after that occurrence we seen two more appear out nowhere and went the same direction as the other 4 it was the craziest feeling ever i was speechless and had goose bumps everywhere!!! i know for a fact it was not a plane because directly to the north was a plane going towards the portland airport at the time of the occurrence.
content.summary: Crazy!!!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at work -- as a staff member at a group home -- in lebanon, oh, in a residential area right on 63 by the black barn in lebanon, oh. at approximately 11:45pm, i was summoned outside by a friend and coworker to look at what he thought was an airplane on fire. upon going outside, i saw the object moving in a straight-line north-northwest (five people were present that witnessed this including myself). it was at a lower elevation than an airplane typically would be. it pulsed subtly a fiery orange which gave the illusion of an object on fire, but it moved unwavering in a straight light, had no tail or trace of light in its wake, and stayed a consistent yet vague roundish shape. it emitted no sound. i had no odd feelings watching it other than awe at something unknown. i took a photo of the object and a short video on my phone, but both only came across as a small light in the sky more white than what i witnessed with my eyes. while outside, when the object was overhead (and just to the east of us) someone made a comment that it smelled like a skunk outside. it took roughly a minute for the object to disappear into the clouds towards the horizon (north-northwest from us). the skunk smell was gone by the time it passed out of sight. we remained outside long after the sighting, but witnessed nothing further.

re: media attached.
the first attachment is a photo. the bright orange light is a street lamp (and looks closer to the color of the object we saw than the object appears in the photograph).
the second attachment is a video. for whatever reason, the video is tilted to the left where the ground is appearing up the right side of video.
content.summary: Saw a bright, pulsating orange object -- moving in a direct line -- pass over a residential area in lebanon, oh.

content.detailedDescription: The unknown light source was observed for a duration of approximately 10 seconds.  i was seated on my deck facing the south and looked up and saw this circular light.  it had a glowing center, a middle band of dark and then a perimeter that was of equal proportion to the middle band.  the perimeter was glowing about the same intensity as the center.  it was headed to the ne.  at about the one thousand five count the light source changed direction and abruptly turned to the se and began to ascend.  at about the one thousand 10 count it had faded and or entered partial haze/overcast.  the light source was approximately half the size of a softbook match head held at arm's length , and was much brighter and larger than the background stars that were observed prior to and after the sighting.
content.summary: A glowing center, a band of dark, and a perimeter that also glowed

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was very early morning about 130am 140am and i forgot to take the trash to the street for pick up and really did not want to take it to the street that night. i was taking the can to the street and before i got there i looked up i could not say why i did not hear anything. that is when i saw it a orange round ball object that looked as if it moved in waves slower then faster it was moving with the and just made a wide turn and came right at me over the top of some homes on the river and it looked as if it stopped but i think it was my line of vision because it made like a u-turn and then went to the north northeast. it looked brighter on the top and the bottom and it almost looked as if it was see though in the center of it it looked as if it was very close almost right over me. i ran into the house to get a camera and my cell phone and ran back out. i started to go back to the spot i saw it but went to the back yard and i think i could see it for a second but it would have been 3 to 4 miles away by then. i thought it was going to do the same thing as the first round orange ball like object but it had a dome over the ball. that object got so bright i thought it was going to bust into flames but it just disparaged just gone. this ball looked as if it was gone to get brighter and that maybe because it got closer to me. the thing was the way it moved like in waves. i have photos of other things but not right at me and almost on top of me. before i ran i looked to see if i could spot a light beam from the ground that some one could have been doing this but nothing that would look like a flash lights beam going up. this was not a falling star this changed direction it turned from the river came back at me then made a u-turn the go north northwest from me. please if anyone also saw it post it and contact me i would like to hear what you saw. after i saw this i stopped and wrote down every thing right then the time the way it looked the way it was going it was wild really just wild. if i can add to this post later i will add a map and the way it was moving.
content.summary: Round in shape looked to move in waves and the top & bottom were brighter then the center

content.detailedDescription:
Just watching sunset to the west. plano, texas. bright starlike object appeared out of nowhere. grabbed monoculures to look at it and saw two lights. thought to self it can't be star/planet. focused on with mono and took picture. that's when i saw the lights distinctively and to my surprise...A triangle shaped object. took two pics.No weird feelings or noise...Too distant.
however, 1hr or so before this...Taking pic of sunset, noticed a black dot in pic. zoomed in and it appears to be a silver dome like disc.
content.summary: Watching sunset; appeared 30 degs over horizon

content.detailedDescription: Just a little after the pools closed at the atlantis resort me and my wife were getting to know the facilities when we saw a very diferente looking object in the sky. we were just in front of the cove hotel around 7pm and there weren't maby people around specially because everything was closed.The object was norh of us above the sea.At first it looked like na airplane breaking the speed of sound but he pictures are very weird. we also asked and people told us that the army bases were very far away and in the opposite direction. we filmed also but it was very dark so i didn't attach it. does anyone know what this could be..
content.summary: Weird seighting in atlantis towers

content.detailedDescription:
my grandmother contacted mufon many years ago with her past abductions and sightings. she was even contacted personally by then. i will not get into all of that as it is a very long story. 

  but after my grandmother and i had coincidentally had another (short conversation) about her experiences, i soon after went to go visit my boyfriend who lives in the city. it was late at night and i had looked out the window at an extremely purple sky with a large and strange cloud formation. i instinctively felt the need to take a picture. so i borrow my boyfriends camera. i was unable to see any lights at all in the sky at the time, not even planes, on account of the cloudiness. i set the camera function to 'night landscape'. i know night vision is actually most preferred, but sadly didn't/nor do i have it. but also very unfortunately, you don't get to see the very purple hue of the sky. 

  still..After taking the picture, a formation of lights appeared at the top, nearly center of the picture and of the cloud formation. i'm not 100% on what it is, honestly. only picture it showed up in. i plan to try doing this with photo's in different places more often, so hopefully i will update soon!
content.summary: Appeared in a picture after the clouds and sky looked odd & felt urge to take it. didn't see anything without the camera.

content.detailedDescription: My family an i were eating on market street in meeker, co. we were seated on a table outside of a chinese food restaurant when i (don) saw a glowing orange/white object emerge from behind a grove of trees about 300 yards away. i noticed it first because it appeared to be flying very slowly and with no noise or nav lights. i thought it might have been a plane or a balloon but since i spent a career in aviation and my son is at the united states air force academy (and had the object in his field glasses the entire time). it appeared and moved slowly from right to left at about 15-20 degrees above the tree line and was moving upward to the west and south as it gained altitude. it moved up, hovered, moved left then right, and began moving off to the south. others reported it in meeker to the local police department and i have the officer's name. having seen an object before and having an inherent interest in aviation, i knew this object was under some sort of control but had no typical general or military aviation characteristics. we all felt very surprised that we could not make sense of the object. no noise, no nav lights, and a strange shape and glow left us all a bit unnerved. we lost sight of it as it abruptly lost it's lights but my son who had it in his filed glasses, could see that the object was then black and spherical, about ten meters in diameter and continued to move to the south without lights of any kind until we lost it towards the horizon or somewhere in that area. multiple observers and witnesses in town, 6 there at the site.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Family eating at a picnic table, saw object emerge from behind trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking images (on my phone :-{ ) of some 'chemtrails' that i do so often and upon reviewing images recently i noticed this blue glowing object. it's not very clear, resolution poor, but it could be simply explained by natural occurrences. image taken may 13th, 2013 6:40 pm.

i have uploaded 4 images ...

1) original
2) cropped
3) dark stroke filter zoomed
4) plastic wrap filter zoomed
content.summary: Object noticed after pic was taken

content.detailedDescription: We are walking on the beach and appears in one of the photo/picture.
content.summary: Typical image like saturn with color grey and surface reflect

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car, passenger seat, and i looked up into the sky. i saw a silver, spherical, disk flying where planes fly. if was going in a straight path, heading northeast, for about 3 seconds, and simply disappeared. it looked like it just turned invisible. i was the only one who had seen it. my mom was also in the car with me. it was a bright, clear, day without a cloud in the sky. i was shocked after i saw this because i am an alien fanatic and first assumed it was a u.F.O. i believe it actually may have been.
content.summary: Silver, spherical, disk

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside with my wife in the est of laval, gazing to the south while smoking a cigarette when i noticed something moving from the far west high in the sky from the corner of my eye. at first i thought it was a plane, but then noticed it had no red or white flashing lights as all planes have. the skies where clear  at the same moment i noticed a plane flying from est to west, south of me, the plane was located above the river and was getting ready to land as it was descending and was about 20km away from the montreal���pierre elliott trudeau international airport and when i was comparing the two, i was positive what i saw moving above me it was not a plane.
the only thing i can compare it to is it looked exactly like a star and it was flying across the sky with a bright white shine like a start has, giving it a round star shape. it was much higher in altitude then any plane and looked a little bigger but very high in the sky right above me and moving a fast at a constant speed. i observed it for more then 20 sec, then i knew this was not a meteor. that is when i decided to get my 5 megapixel camera and film it.  i was filming for about 25sec, and then the flying star simply faded away and disappeared. my impression if you would want to draw it out on a map, to give you an idea of the trajectory: the start shape was moving from val-des-monts qc to sherbrook qc.
content.summary: Ufo passing over laval quebec canada

content.detailedDescription:
i did not notice the two ufo's while taking the photo's. several hrs later, while editing the images, i noticed two metallic, oddly shaped objects hovering in the sky above the ocean, west of yachats, oregon.

for lack of a better comparison, both objects resembled metallic hot dogs, with a bright light emanating from the center of both objects.  

i'm curious as to what you think these objects are?

btw, i've talked with one person in yachats who claims to have witnessed a "huge" ufo moving westward along the yachats river valley.
content.summary: While editing photos shot at yachats beach i noticed two ufo's in the photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was just looking out window and then i just saw this light then.. swoosh it disappeared like a flash!!!!
content.summary: Looked like a sort of basic ufo still creepy!

content.detailedDescription: Near dusk. after 6 but before 6:30. i was standing in my driveway having a cigarette and watching the sun set when i noticed this dark object moving towards me. thought at first it was a plane but appeared to be flying very low in the sky. next thought that maybe it was a balloon of some kind. as it got closer, i noticed it stop and hover in the sky for a brief time before resuming it's path which definitely freaked me out because i've never seen anything do that. as it passed overhead i realized that this was a definite disc shaped object. i don't like to be that cliche with my description but that's what it was. it made no noise which i thought was particularly weird for as close as it seemed to be. as it moved away towards the southeast i noticed a red light at the rear of the object. it didn't pulsate or blink or anything like that. it was just a solid light. it continued on it's path until it was so far away it was no longer visible. the whole sighting lasted maybe a minute. even though i had my cell phone in my pocket, i didn't even think of taking video or a picture because honestly i was too stunned at what i was seeing. i live 40 miles from whiteman air force base(home of the stealth bombers) and i've seen all kinds of different aircraft. i've also seen blimps and stuff like that go right over my head but this was something different. i'm not saying that it was anything unidentifiable but it was definitely something i have never seen before or since. i've kept this to myself for so long because i didn't want people to think i was crazy or stupid.
content.summary: Silent, dark disc shaped object moved slowly, hovered for a brief time then moved off again. red light at rear observed

content.detailedDescription: On thursday june 20, 2013 approx 9:45-10pm in canterbury n.H. we were outside watching fireflies on the path we have leading to our chicken coop; my boyfriend damon and i noticed in the sky what we thought to be planes. i grew concerned when i realised how closely they were flying from one another. about 100 feet from where we stood the objects were coming from the direction of shaker village. there were 3 red bright lights round in shape. there were 2 red lights that were clearly separate objects following closely to a much larger object. it flew closer to us; approximately 50 feet above us rather quickly. we were able to get a good look of the flying objects threw an opening in the trees. i saw a triangular shaped flying object with a haze around it. the front object was very large in size with red lights, the 2 separate objects that were following it looked like red balls of light moving in their own paths. the 2 red lights were flying behind it never beside it. the 3 objects hovered slowly over the tree tops towards the north and over our pond in the back yard. we could not see them after they flew over the pond because of the many trees. unfortunately my camera did not pick up what we saw, it actually turned off i fumbled around trying to turn it back on in the mean time keeping my eyes on the objects. i am disappointed i was unable to capture vital proof. i would like to find out if anyone else in the surrounding areas saw what we saw. my boyfriend did call the canterbury police department and the national ufo reporting center. the center said they had a similar sighting called in from connecticut that same night.
content.summary: 3 flying objects in canterbury nh triangle shape and 2 red balls of light behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 6:00 am (mt) on june, 21, 2013,and started a pot of coffee, then went and got dressed. at 6:30 am  i poured myself a cup of coffee then walked through the house to the backyard to have a cigarette. it was a beautiful morning with blue sky and several wispy clouds.

i immediately noticed the round bright white object against the blue sky. i lit a cigarette and stood watching it. the object moved in a straight line, went through one wispy cloud, then against the blue sky, and into another wispy cloud - then disappeared. i stood there for another 15 minutes but it never came out.

i was totally calm while watching the object. we have an airport a few miles away, but this object was too high to be landing. so, i figured it was a plane flying high, going to seattle or portland, but it did not come out of the little wispy cloud and it really didn't look like an airplane.

then i thought it was a satellite, but again it should have continued on a straight path, not disappear. a planet would not have moved in the sky. i am at a loss as to the identity of this object.

i am reporting it because this situation happened and i wanted someone to know. i didn't get my camera because i wasn't disturbed by the object until it disappeared.
content.summary: Round white object moved straight across sky then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my bedroom window, heading to bed and checking out the moon when all of a sudden appeared this star like object moving across the sky, no lights other then it's glow, now flashing lights as a plane would have but moving way too fast to be a plane, not a satelite and i don't think it was a meteor.  i am always suspect and a natural debunker. there was a small cloud and it flew into that cloud so it was high up, it reappeared and kept on it's directional path and then it simily vanished.
content.summary: Extremely bright, traveling fast, no lights other the solid color, not meteor or satelite or plane,

content.detailedDescription:
I had the day off from work on a tuesday and it was a nice day so i decided to clean up my motorcycle. after cleaning, i figured some nice pictures of it would be nice. i parked it in a nice spot in the yard and began taking some pictures. 
i went for a short ride and then came home a couple hours later and put the pics on my computer and that's when i noticed an odd object in one of the pics. at first, i said to my girlfriend "what the hell is that?". she took a look and i zoomed in on the picture and realized what it was, and we just stared at it for a while. i then recalled that shortly after the picture was taken that my cellphone battery had just died.
i never saw or heard anything while i was taking pictures, just happened to spot it after uploading the pics.
content.summary: Taking pictures in my yard and discovered apparent ufo in one image

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two of my friends were in the house watching movies when i observed the unknown craft, circular in its shape, had returned once more. it blinked into being from nothing then became so bright, both a planes landing lights and even a star could not come close to compare to this crafts intensity. it always appears just over the top edge of our neighbors roof. i told the guys to look south out our front window facing the bremerton naval station which is just under 2 miles away. it sat over the bremerton naval station for quite a few minutes. we witnessed it pulsating every color of the rainbow spinning at a high speed and pulsating brighter then dimmer, brighter then dimmer. it began moving slowly toward the (east) port orchard direction and then blurred out. honestly non of us know what it is nor care to speculate. it just is.... i'm amazed every time i see it and even called the tacoma narrows airport asking if they have had calls on it. jay told me no, but i should try to get video of it in flight.
content.summary: Myself and two others have been observing this craft nearly nightly for over a month... this specific instance the craft blinked into existance and then began getting brighter and brighter. it pulsated and hovered over the bremerton naval station.

content.detailedDescription:
As we left the house of a friend, i noticed an unusual light in the sky that appeared to be hovering over on on the other side of a nearby hill. i told my children who took a short while to locate it. i said "there's a ufo" and they searched until locating it then agreed it was an unidentified flying object.
we watched for about two minutes and the object appeared to hover, but may have been moving closer directly toward us as it did appear to get slightly larger.
i took three photos on my iphone, but it was so far away it was not visible on the screen of the phone. when i downloaded the photos to my computer i could see a single light, but in the sky it looked about two centimetres across and only a few millimetres high. i estimate it was at leats a couple of kilometres away.
while it was still some kilometres away it disappeared behind the cloud cover.
content.summary: Leaving a friend's house we noticed an elongated pulsating light hovering to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garage working on my car late and i went out side for some fresh air around 2 am and i happened to notice a flashing light in the distance ! at fist i thought that it was just a plane probably passing by, but then i noticed that it wasn't moving at all! it's now 3 am and it still hasn't moved at all and it keeps flashing every 3 seconds!  it is a very noticeable flashing light! this hasn't happened before so i'm continuing to watch it .
content.summary: Flashing

content.detailedDescription: 6 dimly lit and randomly flashing ufo disks/orb at about 10,000 feet(guess) traveling north over sacramento california. i recently had a c5 with brown zeta and close encounter with hundreds orbs opening a portal may 14th, 2013. i have saw a tall zeta with broom stick body step out of my bed 3 days may 17th after may 14th encounter of the close kind. i have had experience in the last 3 years many ufo sighting that i asked to see.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 ufos traveling over sacramento
